channel.title: Alabama Football Podcast - College Football Talk dedicated to the University of Alabama Crimson Tide
channel.description: Hello and Welcome to the Alabama Football Podcast! We’re glad you found us. But who are we? Fair question. We’re Tom and Dave, Alabama graduates and big college football fans. However, we have a unique and intense passion for the Alabama Crimson Tide. Over the years we’ve spent countless hours talking about the Alabama Football team and one day in 2010 we got the idea that we should turn our idle talk into a podcast, and so was born the Alabama Football Podcast. The original podcast branded as such. In early 2014 we were offered the opportunity to merge our football podcast with BamaHammer dot com, one of the leading Alabama sports sites around and we’re looking forward to using this platform to help us reach and forge relationships with even more Alabama fans who enjoy a little intelligent and opinionated football talk. We trust you’ll enjoy our show and we welcome your feedback. We’re reachable via the BamaHammer website or directly at AlabamaFootballPodcast (@) gmail dot com. In the meantime, Roll Tide.

image.title: Alabama Football Podcast - College Football Talk dedicated to the University of Alabama Crimson Tide

channel.itunes:author: Alabama Football Podcast - College Football Talk Specialists, Powered by BamaHammer
channel.itunes:summary:
Hello and Welcome to the Alabama Football Podcast! We’re glad you found us.
But who are we? Fair question. We’re Tom and Dave, Alabama graduates and big college football fans. However, we have a unique and intense passion for the Alabama Crimson Tide. Over the years we’ve spent countless hours talking about the Alabama Football team and one day in 2010 we got the idea that we should turn our idle talk into a podcast, and so was born the Alabama Football Podcast. The original podcast branded as such.
In early 2014 we were offered the opportunity to merge our football podcast with BamaHammer dot com, one of the leading Alabama sports sites around and we’re looking forward to using this platform to help us reach and forge relationships with even more Alabama fans who enjoy a little intelligent and opinionated football talk.
We trust you’ll enjoy our show and we welcome your feedback.
We’re reachable via the BamaHammer website or directly at AlabamaFootballPodcast (@) gmail dot com.
In the meantime, Roll Tide.

item.title: Alabama Football 2014 Preview Quarterbacks & Running Backs
item.description: In this episode Tom and Dave discuss Alabama Quarterbacks and Running Backs as fall camp hits full stride.  What are we hearing, seeing, and projecting into the 2014 season.
item.itunes:subtitle: College Football Returns

item.title: Alabama Quarterbacks Summer 2014
item.description:
Alabama Football Podcast

 

In this episode Tom and Dave discuss Alabama’s Quarterback position.  We’ve teased this topic for a while and given recent developments, now’s the right time to unpack the position.
item.itunes:subtitle: Which Alabama Quarterback takes on College Football in 2014?

item.title: 2014 Alabama Spring Game
item.description:
Alabama Football Podcast

In this episode Tom and Dave discuss the Alabama A Day game.  What clues did this game leave as to the success the Tide may have in the 2014 college football season?
item.itunes:subtitle: 2014 Alabama Football A Day

item.title: 2014 Spring Practice - Questions on Defense
item.description:
A Spring Practices begins across the College Football landscape, the Alabama Football Podcast team talks through specific topics to watch for as the Alabama Football team takes to the practice fields.

In this show we explore questions we want to watch on Defense.
item.itunes:subtitle: Alabama Defense Questions Going into Spring Practice

item.title: 2014 Spring Practice - Questions on Offense
item.description:

In this show we explore questions we want to watch on Offense.
item.itunes:subtitle: Alabama Offense Questions Going into Spring Practice

item.title: 2014 National Signing Day
item.description:
The Alabama Football Podcast is back and better than ever.  We're now powered by Bama Hammer.com!  In this episode Tom and Dave offer their assessment of Alabama's 2014 recruiting class.

Specifically, the podcast reviews the class in the context of the existing roster to ID those signees most likely to contribute to the team this next season.  We hope you'll enjoy and we welcome comments and questions.
item.itunes:subtitle: The 2014 Alabama Recruiting Class

item.title: My Ten Favorite Catches by Kevin Norwood
item.description: Kevin Norwood is perhaps one of the more underrated players to play for Alabama. Certainly this is true of what we’d call the Saban era.
